metadata.dc:title: El genoma del Corynebacterium urealyticum ha sido completamente secuenciado: un progreso clave para conocer la uropatogenicidad y "estilo de vida" de este microorganismo.
[The Corynebacterium urealyticum genome has been completely sequenced: a key advance to know the uropathogenicity and "life style" of this microorganism].
